name: Gold Ring
description: A luxurious ring made of pure gold, adorned with intricate engravings.
looks: The gold ring glimmers with a bright, yellow hue. It is finely crafted with intricate patterns and engravings along the band.

description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.

name: Torch
description: A wooden stick with a cloth wrapped around one end, soaked in oil and set on fire.
